definition.value: Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a red combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one red combination found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a yellow combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates at least one yellow combination found.

Applied to a single question and answer pair, this indicates a green combination. Applied as summary to multiple question and answer pairs in a questionnaire response, this indicates no red or yellow combinations found.

value.value: Grøn spørgsmål/svar-kombination fundet i spørgeskemabesvarelse. Når anført som opsummering for hel spørgeskemabesvarelse er der ikke fundet røde eller gule spørgsmål/svar-kombinationer.
